segments.text: Did you do anything fun over the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't want to go out last weekend , so I decided to stay at home and watch a movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why didn't you want to go out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was very tired after working all week . Sometimes on the weekend I don't have enough energy to go out to a movie theater .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you download a movie or rent it at the store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I downloaded it so that I didn't have to remember to return it .
segments.speaker: S2
